II. Praise of Wisdom by Solomon Introduction - Now what wisdom is, and how she came to be I shall proclaim; and I shall conceal no secrets from you, But from the very beginning I shall search out and bring to light knowledge of her; I shall not diverge from the truth.
For discipline is like her name, she is not accessible to many.
